name: Seylon Instant Milk Tea 3 in 1 Instant Relaxation
description:
Indulge in the convenience and deliciousness of SEYLON Instant Milk Tea, a perfect blend of premium ingredients that makes milk tea preparation quick and effortless.    Key Features:  Convenient and Quick: No need to add milk or sugar, simply mix with hot water and enjoy a creamy and flavorful milk tea in seconds. Premium Ingredients: Crafted with the finest imported raw materials, ensuring a rich and authentic taste experience.  Perfect Balance: The harmonious blend of instant tea, non-dairy creamer, and sugar creates a perfectly balanced and satisfying beverage. Ingredients:  Instant Tea  Non-Dairy Creamer  Sugar Benefits:  Saves time and effort, making it ideal for busy individuals and families.  It provides a quick and easy way to enjoy a delicious milk tea anytime, anywhere.  Perfect for those who prefer a creamy and slightly sweet milk tea experience.  Convenient packaging makes it easy to store and carry.

name: Seylon Gold Tea
description:
Introducing Seylon Gold Tea, a premium tea blend available in a 500 gm package. This tea presents a luxurious and distinctive taste experience that reflects the excellence of Sri Lanka's tea craftsmanship, delivering a cup of pure indulgence to tea connoisseurs around the globe. Indulge in the sophistication of Seylon Gold Tea. Meticulously chosen and artfully blended, this tea harmoniously brings together the finest tea leaves to create a full-bodied and exquisite brew. With a heritage rooted in the esteemed tea estates of Sri Lanka, Seylon Gold Tea promises a flavor that's both opulent and captivating.

name: Brooke Bond Taaza Black Tea
description:
In order to stay on top of your packed day, all you need is a clear mind – what's better than a cup of new Brooke Bond Taaza to refresh & clear your mind. Because only new Brooke Bond Taaza is a tea with High Quality fresh Tea Leaves, packed with the Natural Goodness of Theanine, that helps to clear your mind and enables you to manage the demands of everyday life. This tea is perfect for those Spirited Aspirers who believe that the brighter future of their family is the center of their universe. Our world-class tea tasters and experts blend the tea that results in the exceptional colour, superior taste and impeccable aroma of each “Dana” of our brand. Strong processes ensure that the quality remains consistent throughout the year. Taaza makes sure that this phenomenal journey also resonates in every end cup as absolute refreshment!

name: Tata Tea Premium
description:
In Bangladesh, 'cha' is more than just a cup of tea to start the day. It is an integral part of the culture and life of every Bangladeshi. While drinking 'cha' is enjoyed across the country, the way people like their 'cha' in Bangladesh varies across. Tata Tea Premium, sourced solely from Bangladesh, understands these varying taste preferences and hence our tea experts have crafted a unique blend that 'cha' lovers across Bangladesh will enjoy.For the loving people of Bangladesh, Tata Tea Premium brings a full-bodied blend of Swaad Bhara Cha.

name: Seylon Family Blend Black Tea
description:
Seylon Family Blend Black Tea 400g Details: Seylon Family Blend Black Tea is a premium blend of loose-leaf black tea sourced from the renowned tea-growing regions of Sri Lanka (formerly Ceylon). Known for its rich flavor, bold aroma, and vibrant color, this tea offers a robust and invigorating experience. The Family Blend is typically a balanced mix of various Ceylon teas, making it perfect for regular tea drinkers. It’s ideal for those who enjoy a strong cup, whether brewed traditionally or with milk and is perfect for morning or afternoon tea sessions. Weight:The pack contains 400 grams of loose-leaf black tea, making it a great choice for families or frequent tea drinkers. Ingredients:Black Tea Leaves (from selected tea estates in Sri Lanka)  Natural Flavors (sometimes added to enhance aroma and taste depending on the blend) Uses: Morning Tea is ideal for a strong, refreshing cup to start your day, either black or with milk and sugar.  Afternoon Tea: Perfect for enjoying snacks like cakes, biscuits, or finger sandwiches during afternoon tea.  Iced Tea: Brew the tea, chill it, and serve with ice for a refreshing iced tea, especially in warm weather.  Tea Blends: Customize your tea by adding flavors like lemon, honey, ginger, or mint.  Milk: Often consumed with milk, making it rich and smooth for a comforting beverage.
Seylon Family Blend Black Tea 400g

name: Brooke Bond Taaza Tea Bag 50 pcs
description:
Taaza Tea bags are made of high quality food grade filter paper and uses food grade strings and thread. Finally, to ensure that the tea remains fresh, 2 layers of protective barriers are used to keep moisture out. The tea used is a perfect blend to give an uplifting cup of tea. Taaza’s special double chamber flow-through teabag provides a cup of tea with exceptional colour and taste. Consumers now have the option to customize their own cup of tea, the way they like it — light, regular or strong.

name: Seylon Family Blend Black Tea
description:
Seylon Family Blend Black Tea 200g Details:Seylon Family Blend Black Tea is a premium tea blend made from the finest tea leaves sourced from Sri Lanka (formerly known as Ceylon). Known for its strong flavor, rich color, and robust aroma, this tea provides a refreshing experience whether enjoyed plain, with milk, or with sugar. The Family Blend is typically a well-balanced mix of various black teas, providing a perfect cup for breakfast or throughout the day. It is ideal for those who prefer a bold and invigorating tea.   Weight:The pack contains 200 grams of loose-leaf black tea, which is ideal for frequent tea drinkers and families.   Ingredients:Black Tea Leaves (from selected tea gardens in Sri Lanka)  Natural Flavors (depending on the blend, could include hints of fruit or floral notes) Uses:Morning Beverage: A great option for starting the day with a strong cup of tea.  Afternoon Tea: Perfect for enjoying snacks like biscuits or sandwiches during afternoon tea.  Iced Tea: Brew and cool it to make refreshing iced tea, especially during hot weather.  Tea Blends: Add your favorite flavorings like lemon, ginger, or mint for a personalized touch.  With Milk: Commonly enjoyed with milk and sugar, especially for a rich, smooth tea experience.

name: Kazi & Kazi Organic Tea Family Pack
description:
Kazi & Kazi Tea Family Pack 400 gm: Sharing Warmth and Tradition It was introducing a bundle of warmth and tradition that brings families together – the Kazi & Kazi Tea Family Pack. This generous 400 gm package is a symbol of togetherness, offering a collection of tea that transcends generations and cultures. Kazi & Kazi Tea Family Pack embodies the essence of sharing moments over a cup of tea. It's a tribute to the simple yet profound tradition of coming together, sipping tea, and enjoying conversations that create lasting memories. Each cup brewed from this family pack is a fusion of flavors and experiences. With every sip, you're savoring not just the taste of tea but also the moments shared with loved ones.

name: Halda Valley Black Tea
description:
Fertile soils, easing rainfall, warming sun, and precise care in every processing step are all the elements that bring distinction to the Halda Valley brand and its premium-quality Black tea. When people generally talk of tea they often refer to black tea. Since 19th century when The British started its cultivation black tea has become an inseparable part of daily life. In order to add more value, Halda Valley produces black tea with passion and care. When the leaves are collected, the rule – “two leaves and the bud” is strictly followed to maintain high quality. With the help of experts and a flawless production process, Halda Valley Black Tea gives a pure taste of tea that is desired by tea lovers.

name: Halda Valley Dragon Well Green Tea
description:
King of Chinese green tea Dragon Well tea – also referred to as Long Jing or Lung Ching – originated from Hangzhou in Zhejiang province. Dragon Well is very significant to Chinese culture and it is essential to gain a true experience of Chinese tea. Dragon Well is well regarded amongst green tea lovers and ranks as the finest amongst the top five famous Chinese teas.The Dragon Well Green Tea leaves are picked young and taken back to the village where the skilled tea masters use their bare hands to press them flat in a hot, dry wok in the traditional way. Here, it is meticulously dried by hand using a traditional pan-firing method. Featured as the ‘Tea of the Emperor’, this stunning blend affords a pale and illuminating yellow liquor with the most gentle and pure aroma.
King of Chinese green tea Dragon Well tea – also referred to as Long Jing or Lung Ching – originated from Hangzhou in Zhejiang province. Dragon Well is very significant to Chinese culture and it is essential to gain a true experience of Chinese tea. Here, it is meticulously dried by hand using a traditional pan-firing method. Featured as the ‘Tea of the Emperor’, this stunning blend affords a pale and illuminating yellow liquor with the most gentle and pure aroma.

name: Kazi & Kazi Organic Tea Turmeric Infusion 40 pcs
description:
Kazi & Kazi Tea Turmeric Infusion 40 pcs 60 gm: A Golden Fusion of Health and Warmth It is introducing a cup of wellness that harmonizes the richness of turmeric with the comfort of tea – Kazi & Kazi Tea Turmeric Infusion. In a package containing 40 tea bags, each weighing 60 gm, this infusion offers a delightful blend of natural goodness and soothing flavors. Kazi & Kazi Tea Turmeric Infusion is a celebration of turmeric's golden hues and health benefits. With each sip, you embrace the revitalizing essence of this ancient spice, complemented by the comforting embrace of tea. Turmeric's earthy notes meld seamlessly with the gentle warmth of the tea, creating a fusion that's not just delightful to your taste buds but also offers a range of potential health advantages. Whether you're seeking a moment of relaxation or a soothing pause, a cup of this turmeric-infused tea provides a comforting experience that lifts your spirits and warms your soul.

name: Lipton Green Tea Pure And Light
description:
If you enjoy a cup of Lipton tea, you probably like its flavor and aroma and might drink it at breakfast or use it as a daytime pick-me-up. But in addition to its value as a beverage, there are health-related Lipton tea benefits. Tea's natural compounds, which belong to a class of phytonutrients called flavonoids, may help keep you healthy and lower your risk of several potentially serious chronic conditions.

name: Tata Tea Premium
description:
In Bangladesh, 'cha' is more than just a cup of tea to start the day. It is an integral part of the culture and life of every Bangladeshi. While drinking 'cha' is enjoyed across the country, the way people like their 'cha' in Bangladesh varies across. Tata Tea Premium, sourced solely from Bangladesh, understands these varying taste preferences and hence our tea experts have crafted a unique blend that 'cha' lovers across Bangladesh will enjoy.For the loving people of Bangladesh, Tata Tea Premium brings a full-bodied blend of Swaad Bhara Cha.

name: Halda Valley Red Robe Oolong Tea
description:
Big Red Robe (Da Hong Pao in Chinese) is one of the most famous and exclusive teas in the world. It is designated both a ‘Chinese Famous Tea’ and a ‘The Four Great Bushes’ tea. Da Hong Pao is the most expensive tea sold on the global market and is usually reserved for honored guests in China. It is a long-leaf oolong tea with a sweet aroma, a unique woodsy character, and fruity muscatel tones. It has a robust taste, but generally no bitterness. Only a few of the original bushes remain and they are highly guarded. Da Hong Pao is a classic Wu Yi Rock Oolong tea from Fujian Province in China. With 600 years old legendary story of healing the Emperor’s mother of the Ming Dynasty, this famous tea is now the most popular among all oolong teas. Its slowly baked leaves result in traditional roasted flavors yet it has subtle sweet notes of exotic flowers. Halda Valley is truly proud to present her very own Red Robe Oolong Tea which has an earthly aroma with floral hints. The long-lasting and very comforting taste and traditional healing characteristics of this very famous Halda Valley Oolong tea, make it a clear choice for tea admirers around the world.
Big Red Robe (Da Hong Pao in Chinese) is one of the most famous and exclusive teas in the world. It is designated both a ‘Chinese Famous Tea’ and a ‘The Four Great Bushes’ tea. It is a long-leaf oolong tea with a sweet aroma, a unique woodsy character, and fruity muscatel tones. It has a robust taste, but generally no bitterness. Only a few of the original bushes remain and they are highly guarded.

The long-lasting and very comforting taste and traditional healing characteristics of this very famous Halda Valley Oolong tea, make it a clear choice for tea admirers around the world.

name: Halda Valley Golden Eyebrow Black Tea
description:
Golden Eyebrow Black Tea is one of the most exquisite and innovative addition in Chinese Black Tea heritage, created on 2005. Halda Valley Golden Eyebrow Black Tea is also the newest member amongst all the Speciality Tea ranges. With direct supervision of famous Jin Jun Mei tea master Mr. Wong Shuliang, the journey of this tea started on August 2018 and now they are readily available in 2 attractive packs for local and export market.Unlike original Chinese version, our Golden Eyebrow Black Tea is made of delicate handpicked one bud and one leaves that has several notable characteristics, beginning with its long, thin appearance just like an eyebrow. It offers strong honey and floral fragrance with distinctly honey-sweet & mellow taste. The colour of the liquor is a rather pale, translucent gold. This is truly a very rich, complex black tea to be served proudly that release spectrum of flavors to be enjoyed in multiple infusions.

name: Dr. H&H Slimming Tea Bags 30 pcs
description:
Dr. H&H Slimming Tea is a specially formulated herbal tea designed to support weight management and promote healthy digestion. Its natural ingredients aim to boost metabolism and assist in fat reduction when paired with a balanced diet and regular exercise. Ingredients: The tea typically includes a blend of natural herbs known for their slimming and digestive benefits. Key ingredients may include green tea, Garcinia cambogia, ginger, and other herbal extracts​. How to Use: Boil water and let it cool slightly. Steep one tea bag in the water for 3–5 minutes. Consume it hot or warm, preferably 1–2 times a day. For best results, use it consistently as part of a healthy lifestyle.This product is suitable for individuals seeking a natural aid for weight management, but it is recommended to consult a healthcare professional before use, especially if you have medical conditions.

This product is suitable for individuals seeking a natural aid for weight management, but it is recommended to consult a healthcare professional before use, especially if you have medical conditions.

name: Dr. H&H Pure Arjun Tea bags 40 pcs
description:
Dr. H&H Pure Arjun Tea is crafted using all-natural ingredients, known for its wholesome and therapeutic benefits. This tea is free from sugar, artificial flavors, preservatives, and chemical additives, ensuring a pure and healthy beverage. It is suitable for anyone seeking natural health remedies.Ingredients: Natural ingredients. The primary component is Arjuna (Terminalia Arjuna), a medicinal herb traditionally used to support cardiovascular health. Use: Place one tea bag in a cup. Pour hot water (not boiling) over the tea bag. Let it steep for 2–4 minutes, depending on your taste preference. Sweeten with honey if desired. This tea is ideal for maintaining overall wellness, particularly for supporting heart health and managing stress naturally.

name: Dr. H&H Fine Triphala Tea bags 40 pcs
description:
Dr. H&H Fine Triphala Tea is a herbal blend designed to support digestion and overall health. It is rich in antioxidants and traditionally used to aid indigestion, constipation, and symptoms of Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS). It also helps regulate blood sugar levels, making it beneficial for those managing diabetes. This tea promotes detoxification and general well-being.Origin: The tea is produced by Dr. H&H, a well-known brand specializing in herbal and natural teas, Origin: Bangladesh.Ingredients: Triphala is a traditional Ayurvedic formula made from three key fruits:Amalaki (Emblica officinalis) - Rich in Vitamin C, supports immunity.Bibhitaki (Terminalia bellirica) - Aids digestion and has detoxifying properties.Haritaki (Terminalia chebula) - Known for its cleansing effects on the body.How to Use: Boil water and steep one tea bag in a cup for 3-5 minutes.Add honey or lemon if desired for flavor.Consume once or twice daily to experience its benefits.This tea is suitable for those looking for a natural remedy to improve digestive health and detoxify the body.
Dr. H&H Fine Triphala Tea is a herbal blend designed to support digestion and overall health. It is rich in antioxidants and traditionally used to aid indigestion, constipation, and symptoms of Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS). It also helps regulate blood sugar levels, making it beneficial for those managing diabetes. This tea promotes detoxification and general well-being.
Origin: The tea is produced by Dr. H&H, a well-known brand specializing in herbal and natural teas, Origin: Bangladesh.
Ingredients: Triphala is a traditional Ayurvedic formula made from three key fruits:
Amalaki (Emblica officinalis) - Rich in Vitamin C, supports immunity.
Bibhitaki (Terminalia bellirica) - Aids digestion and has detoxifying properties.
Haritaki (Terminalia chebula) - Known for its cleansing effects on the body.
How to Use: Boil water and steep one tea bag in a cup for 3-5 minutes.
Add honey or lemon if desired for flavor.Consume once or twice daily to experience its benefits.This tea is suitable for those looking for a natural remedy to improve digestive health and detoxify the body.

name: Kazi & Kazi Organic First Flush Black Tea
description:
Boil a cup of water up to 80 degrees Celsius. When the water is boiling, add First Flush tea in the water, stir it & keep it closed for 5 mins. Filtered the infused leaves from liquor. Add sugar or honey according to your preference.
